title: Adrenaline Threat is looking for a Top and Support!
body:
Hey guys our competitive team is looking for a stable top and Support laner! We are a competitive team that has been up for about two months and are looking for members who are willing to commit to tournament play, ranked 5v5, scrimmages, and having practice schedules. (We are trying to e as legit as possible). Here is the list of requirements that we have decided as a team: 

Be able to stay active (we have three practices a week members are required to show up to every one unless a valid reason is given)
Be 16 or older (maturity is what we are looking for so this is not a hard cap)
Be expected to learn Win or lose (looking for team members who wont quit the team as soon as we go on a losing spree and are willing to work through the good and bad moments)
Be able to have fun (this is a game after all and members should be expected to enjoy and encourage each other)

With that being said here is a application form please fill it out if interested: 

age:
role:
champs (top three):
division (rank):
position of interest (role):
Weaknesses:
strengths:

My ign is Coruptz aT feel free to add me if necessary! See you on the rift! {{champion:254}}

Weaknesses: over aggressive at times ... warding as a top
strengths: map awareness, extensive champion knowledge, theorycrafting experience

u know u feel bad when all the requesters are diamond gold and silver

buuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuummmpppp

age:16
role:Support
champs (top three): Thresh, Bard, Leona
division (rank): Silver 1
position of interest (role): Support 
Weaknesses: Too loud and too talkative sometimes, some plays i make are risky.
strengths: Able to commute information to where enemy is, able to make good shot calls, good peeling mechanics ( good mechanic overall), main focus is vision to know what decision there is to make to have a proper execution.

Overall, I can adapt to the team when in need and through practices, itll become easier for me to change my playing habits!!

I wants in. 
age: 17
role: Mid, Supp, can jg.
champs (top three): {{champion:245}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:12}} 
division (rank): Wooooood but Im looking to climb.
position of interest (role): Can fill but would prefer mid
Weaknesses: Im still trying to learn when its appropriate to take objectives vs when to roam top or bot. Im working on improving every aspect of my play especially working with a team. I feel as if league was meant to be played 5v5 and have struggled to climb solo because I feel oh so lonely.
strengths: I love feeding my team mates and you can always count on me to try and be positive even in the worst games. Im underestimated because of my division.. (haha) but I feel the need to prove I can do so much better. Im on every day like clockwork so Ill have lots of time to practice. When I play ekko i feel as if I jsut straight up went into the avatar state like aang. {{summoner:1}} 
Please notice me senpai. P.S I enjoy long walks on the beach and sour patch kids.
